[[inst_hl_ldip_u]]
==== HL.LDIP.U

*Syntax:* hl.ldip.u [SrcL, simm], ->Dst0, Dst1

*Description:* Long immediate variant supporting extended address range (48-bit).

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_ldip_u.svg[HL.LDIP.U encoding,width=800]

*Group:* LDA/PAIR
